channel.title: Woman Gives Birth to Twins of Different Races
channel.description:
LONDON - A pair of British twin boys has been born with different skin color, a rare genetic occurrence according to experts. In an interview with Britain's Sky News program, mother Kerry Richardson said that the boys were both born white but as they've gotten older one of the boys got darker and the other lighter. Today, she says, the twins attract attention wherever they go. Richardson is of mixed race, with Nigerian and English heritage, while the father is white. A genetics expert at Oxford University says such births are rare, as the genes that cause skin color normally mix together. In this case, he says, it appears the genes for skin color didn't combine for some reason and the boys may have inherited different genetic codes from their mother.
Source: http://www.comcast.net/news/science/index.jsp?cat=SCIENCE&fn=/2006/10/27/508274.html In my opinion that's extremely odd, and hard to believe. Same father? :\

@goatee wrote:

[quote=“cruel, post:20, topic:20384”][quote author=pie pie pie link=topic=30955.msg467147#msg467147 date=1163677407]
but a womans “egg” splits, making twins, must be the same…albino?
[/quote]
It only splits when they are identical twins.
And sometimes it just explodes, killing everyone within a 10 mile radius.[/quote]

That happens loads around here… the debris sucks cos the dead fetuses stick to my dads car window and he makes me scrape them off and fry them for breakfast… they are tasty with seasoning but it still takes a long time to prepare … But i have an idea for selling them to stem cell research ;D

item.title: Woman Gives Birth to Twins of Different Races
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

It means they were fraternal twins (there were two eggs instead of one being split by the sperm). So that means different sperm got to both o the eggs. So she must have gotten screwed twice in a row (or more)… lol
